title: Dragon Ball - Unguarded (Doujinshi)
description:
A fan comic that explores Freeza's past, and a possible series of events that could have lead him to become the way he is. This is Freeza in the early days before he became a ruthless tyrant. A calm, polite child, who wouldn't hurt a fly.

Watch as he gradually begins his descent into darkness.

Author's websites:
http://ladytygrycomics.com/Pages/Unguarded/Archives.aspx
https://www.facebook.com/ladytygrycomics/

matches.title: Shin Seiki Evangelion - RE-TAKE Soushuuhen Zen Nenrei Han (Doujinshi)
